scripts.bump:patch: cd hacks/kftray-utils && cargo run --bin bump_version patch
scripts.bump:minor: cd hacks/kftray-utils && cargo run --bin bump_version minor
scripts.bump:major: cd hacks/kftray-utils && cargo run --bin bump_version major
scripts.format: pnpm run format:front && pnpm run format:back
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @kftray/ui run lint && pnpm run lint:back
scripts.precommit: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint
scripts.release:minor: cargo run --bin bump_version minor && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: release new version'
scripts.release:patch: cargo run --bin bump_version patch && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: release new version'
